title: Windows 7 web clone
body: A web version of windows 7 made with Angular 17 and TypeScript, it has the basic functionalities of the operating system and a few applications.

title: Word as a C++ IDE
body: A Windows Form application that turns Microsoft Word in an IDE for C++ development, allowing compiling and running the code, and it has colors too.

title: Spin Warriors
body: A 2D fighting game made with Unity inspired by BeyBlade, two players use their skills and powers in order to throw the other out of the arena
